name: Wildlife Tycoon: Venture Africa
description:
The Ultimate Ecosystem Sim GameFrom the back-catalog of Pocketwatch Games, 2005's Wildlife Tycoon: Venture Africa was the game that started this indie's journey.

Expect the unexpected out of this unique Tycoon game -- There are no people to please, there is no money to horde, there are only animals. Packs of hungry lions, families of chattering baboons, and epic herds of wildebeests fill the ecosystems that players create and control.Features
  • "Be the Animal" lets you take control over any creature
  • Earn jewels for building balanced ecosystems -- and use those jewels to bring rain to the desert
  • Compete for trophies and hidden content in the Sandbox or follow the journey of Dr. Willoughby and Miss Carrilou in Story Mode
